statusLine.command: input=$(cat); username=$(whoami); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // .model.id'); ESC=$(printf '\033'); cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null; git_info=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then git_branch=$(git --no-optional-locks rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); git_status=$(git --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); staged=$(echo "$git_status" | grep -c '^[AMDR]' 2>/dev/null || echo 0); modified=$(echo "$git_status" | grep -c '^.[M]' 2>/dev/null || echo 0); deleted=$(echo "$git_status" | grep -c '[D]' 2>/dev/null || echo 0); untracked=$(echo "$git_status" | grep -c '^??' 2>/dev/null || echo 0); git_status_str=""; [ "$staged" -gt 0 ] 2>/dev/null && git_status_str="${git_status_str} ${ESC}[32mA:${staged}${ESC}[0m"; [ "$modified" -gt 0 ] 2>/dev/null && git_status_str="${git_status_str} ${ESC}[33mM:${modified}${ESC}[0m"; [ "$deleted" -gt 0 ] 2>/dev/null && git_status_str="${git_status_str} ${ESC}[31mD:${deleted}${ESC}[0m"; [ "$untracked" -gt 0 ] 2>/dev/null && git_status_str="${git_status_str} ${ESC}[36mU:${untracked}${ESC}[0m"; git_info=" ${ESC}[36m$git_branch*${ESC}[0m${git_status_str}"; fi; short_dir=$(echo "$current_dir" | awk -F'/' '{n=NF; if(n<=3) print; else {printf "â€¦/"; for(i=n-2;i<=n;i++){printf "%s", $i; if(i<n) printf "/"}}}'); if [ -n "$git_info" ]; then printf "${ESC}[34m%s${ESC}[0m | [${ESC}[35m%s${ESC}[0m] |%s | ${ESC}[2m%s${ESC}[0m" "$username" "$short_dir" "$git_info" "$model_name"; else printf "${ESC}[34m%s${ESC}[0m | [${ESC}[35m%s${ESC}[0m] | ${ESC}[2m%s${ESC}[0m" "$username" "$short_dir" "$model_name"; fi
